title: 274. An Egghead’s Guide to the Super Bowl
description: We assembled a panel of smart dudes -- a two-time Super Bowl champ; a couple of NFL linemen, including one who's getting a math Ph.D. at MIT; and our resident economist -- to tell you what to watch for, whether you're a football fanatic or a total newbie.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
